title: David Lawless
content:
**[Indices](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809011122/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Indices) : [Designers](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809011122/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Designers) : [David Lawless](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809011122/http:/typophile.com/wiki/David%20Lawless)**

David Lawless was born in Liverpool, [UK](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809011122/http:/typophile.com/wiki/United%20Kingdom), in [1974](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809011122/http:/typophile.com/wiki/1974) and studied Graphic Design in 1992 at [Kingston University](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809011122/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Kingston%20University). He started work at MET2, a small design studio in Manchester, in 1994, as well as teaching Foundation and HND Graphic Design part time at St Helens College of Art & Design.

He now works full time at Studio Liddell, a design, illustration and animation studio based in Manchester.

[www.studioliddell.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809011122/http:/www.studioliddell.com/ "www.studioliddell.com")
author: David Lawless
